Row.Text: AI Cannot Build World Wonders
AI players cannot build world projects or wonders.
AI Cannot Build Settlers
AI players will never build units that can settle.
AI Cannot Make Prophets or Missionaries
AI players cannot make missionaries and great prophets to spread their religion to cities owned by human players.
AI Won't Declare War
AI players will not declare war on humans.
